name: TIMORE 5 THE FLOOD
description:
Timore 5 The Flood is an addition to Timore 5, where you explore the basement of the Frank's house and discover about the creation named PAINbot001.
You play as Sarah, who got trapped by PAINbot001, find out about the 001 and get out of the basement.

You are not required to own Timore 5 to run this game.
